object.name: verifyChat
object.description: Verifies a chat on behalf of the organization which is represented by the bot. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Verifies a chat on behalf of the organization which is represented by the bot. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Verifies a chat `on behalf of the organization <https://telegram.org/verify#third-party-verification>`_ which is represented by the bot. Returns :code:`True` on success.
